site.name: BurgerEerst.nl
site.tagline: Citizens first. Security of living, restored.
site.metaDescription: Sign the petition against the current cabinet’s direction: stop benefit cuts, stop rising cost stacking, restore basic security and democratic trust.

home.heroLead: The cabinet’s direction combines cuts and rising costs that hit citizens with the least financial room the hardest. We say: enough is enough.

pillars.title: No benefit cuts
pillars.body: People who cannot work deserve stability — not punishment in euros.

pillars.title: Stop cost stacking
pillars.body: VAT, healthcare, housing and fixed costs can’t keep rising while incomes lag behind.

pillars.title: Fair burden sharing
pillars.body: Stop shifting the bill onto low and middle incomes.

pillars.title: Restore trust
pillars.body: Major decisions must be transparent and backed by public support.

demands: No further cuts to disability/Wajong-like benefits.
Basic security as a hard floor — policy must not push people underwater structurally.
No additional cost increases that disproportionately hit low and middle incomes.
Transparency and real input for policies that directly affect everyday life.
home.notBody: This is not a party campaign and not an attack on any group of people. BurgerEerst.nl is independent and stands for fair debate and humane policy.

vision.title: Our vision
vision.lead: Citizens should not be at the bottom of the bill. Policy must start with capacity, fairness and democratic control.

sections.title: Basic security isn’t a luxury
sections.body: If you can’t work, you must still be able to live. Cutting the most vulnerable is socially unsustainable and destroys trust.

sections.title: Fair policy starts with fair sharing
sections.body: Costs must not be structurally shifted to people without buffers. A strong country protects the floor.

sections.title: Transparency and public input
sections.body: Major changes in healthcare, benefits and costs must be transparent and demonstrably backed by public support.

nexit.title: NEXIT (separate page)
nexit.lead: This page is separate from the petition. Here we explain why an open, democratic debate about the EU relationship can be valuable.
body: BurgerEerst.nl does not tie NEXIT to the petition. You can support the petition without agreeing with this page.
We argue for the right to a serious debate on sovereignty, regulation and democratic control — no taboos, but facts, pros/cons and respect.
Any move towards a NEXIT would require careful preparation: impact analysis, scenarios and broad democratic decision-making.

privacy.title: Privacy policy
body: We process minimal personal data: name, city and email to verify your signature.
Your email is used for double opt-in confirmation and is never sold or shared for marketing.
You can request deletion of your data via the contact email.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
body: BurgerEerst.nl is an independent civic website and is not affiliated with any political party.
The information on this site is meant for public debate and civic participation.
Abuse, hate speech and calls for violence are not allowed.
